Uses of Package
com.spazedog.lib.rootfw3.extenders

  • Packages that use com.spazedog.lib.rootfw3.extenders 
    Package Description
    com.spazedog.lib.rootfw3  
    com.spazedog.lib.rootfw3.extenders  
  • Classes in com.spazedog.lib.rootfw3.extenders used by com.spazedog.lib.rootfw3 
    Class and Description
    BinaryExtender.Binary
    This class is used to handle binaries located in one of the $PATH variable directories.
    BinaryExtender.Busybox
    This class is used to collect information about either a specific busybox binary, or the one found in the PATH environment variable.
    FileExtender.File
    This is kind of an extension of File, only this does not just come with a lot more tools, it also switches to the root/shell whenever a file operation is not possible using the regular applications permissions.
    FilesystemExtender.Device
    This class is used to handle devices and mount points.
    FilesystemExtender.Filesystem
    This class is used to collect different file system related information.
    InstanceExtender.Instance
    This class is used to share the same RootFW instance across multiple classes and methods.
    MemoryExtender.Device
    This class is used to get information about memory devices like a SWAP or ZRAM device
    Note that this implements the ExtenderGroup interface, which means that it does not allow anything outside RootFW to create an instance of it.
    MemoryExtender.Memory
    This class is used to get information about memory and SWAP devices
    Note that this implements the ExtenderGroup interface, which means that it does not allow anything outside RootFW to create an instance of it.
    ProcessExtender.Power
    This class is used control the device power like reboot shutdown etc.
    ProcessExtender.Process
    This class is used to handle a single process, like getting teh pid, the process name, killing the process etc.
    ProcessExtender.Processes
    This class is used to collect information about all processes on the system.
    PropertyExtender.File
    This class is used to work with property files, like /system/build.prop.
    PropertyExtender.Properties
    This class is used to work with global properties, which means a Java front-end for getProp and setProp.
    ShellExtender.Shell
    This class is used to communicate with the shell.
  • Classes in com.spazedog.lib.rootfw3.extenders used by com.spazedog.lib.rootfw3.extenders 
    Class and Description
    FileExtender.File
    This is kind of an extension of File, only this does not just come with a lot more tools, it also switches to the root/shell whenever a file operation is not possible using the regular applications permissions.
    FileExtender.FileData
    This class is extended from the Data class.
    FileExtender.FileStat
    This class is a container which is used by FileExtender#getDetails() and FileExtender#getDetailedList(Integer)
    FilesystemExtender.DiskStat
    This is a container used to store disk information.
    FilesystemExtender.MountStat
    This is a container used to store mount information.
    InstanceExtender.Instance
    This class is used to share the same RootFW instance across multiple classes and methods.
    InstanceExtender.InstanceCallback
    This interface is used when adding connection callbacks via #addCallback
    InstanceExtender.InstanceRootFW
    This is an extended class of the RootFW class.
    MemoryExtender.MemStat 
    MemoryExtender.SwapStat
    This is a container which is used to store information about a SWAP device
    ProcessExtender.ProcessInfo
    This is a container class used to store information about a process.
    ShellExtender.Shell
    This class is used to communicate with the shell.
    ShellExtender.ShellResult
    This class get's returned after running shell commands.
